revised_title: Scattering by Two Penny-Shaped Cracks with Spring Boundary Conditions: A Study of Elastodynamic Scattering
tldr: The authors investigate the elastodynamic scattering of waves by a penny-shaped crack with spring boundary conditions. They determine the transition matrix of the crack and explore the scattering by two cracks using a multi-centred matrix approach. The back-scattered longitudinal far field amplitude is computed in both frequency and time domains, highlighting the effects of multiple scattering.
